member.name: M:SelfHostedWebScanner.DeviceInfoWrapper.IsDeviceInfoOf(Microsoft.PointOfService.PosCommon)
member.summary: Gets the Boolean value that indicates wether a DeviceInfo instance applies to the specified service object

member.name: M:SelfHostedWebScanner.DeviceInfoWrapper.GetMatchingDeviceInfoFromCollection(Microsoft.PointOfService.DeviceCollection)
member.summary: Gets the matching DeviceInfo instance from the specified DeviceCollection. Returns null if none is found.
